How to install qimsys to Linux. 

== For any distribution ==

See [http://code.google.com/p/qimsys/wiki/InstallFromSource Install From source].

 # add below to ~/.profile, ~/.xprofile or so
{{{
export XMODIFIERS=@im=qimsys
export QT_IM_MODULE=qimsys
export GTK_IM_MODULE=qimsys
}}}
 # logout and login again
 # just type qimsys from console or any way as you like (e.g. KDE menu)


== Gentoo ==

You can use ebuild of qimsys by [http://gitorious.org/kenya888s-overlay/kenya888s-overlay kenya888s-overlay] from Gitorious

 # add the line below to "overlays" stanza of /etc/layman/layman.cfg
{{{
"http://gitorious.org/kenya888s-overlay/kenya888s-overlay/blobs/master/overlays.xml"
}}}
 # add overlay to your local portage.
{{{
#layman -a kenya888s-overlay
}}}
 # Update portage/eix cache
{{{
#emerge --metadata
#eix-update (If you use eix)
}}}
 # install qimsys
{{{
#emerge -av qimsys
}}}

Enjoy!:)
